com.digitalpersona.uareu

Class UareUGlobal

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.digitalpersona.uareu.UareUGlobal

  • public final class UareUGlobal
extends java.lang.Object
    Class represents a main access point to the U.are.U Java SDK library.

    This class contains a set of static factory methods, which allow user to access capture and engine interfaces of the SDK.

    • Method Detail

      • GetReaderCollection

        public static ReaderCollection GetReaderCollection()
                                            throws UareUException
        Creates and returns reader collection.

        Reader collection is a singleton object allowing access to the available fingerprint readers.

        Returns:
        ReaderCollection.
        Throws:
        UareUException

      • DestroyReaderCollection

        public static void DestroyReaderCollection()
                                    throws UareUException
        Releases reader collection.

        This method destroys reader collection and releases resources associated with the readers.

        Throws:
        UareUException

      • GetEngine

        public static Engine GetEngine()
        Returns engine.

        Engine is a singleton object for the purpose of extracting features from FIDs to create FMDs, identify/compare FMDs and convert FMDs to different formats.

        Returns:
        Engine.

      • GetImporter

        public static Importer GetImporter()
        Returns importer.

        Importer is a singleton object for the purpose of importing existing FIDs and FMDs.

        Returns:
        Importer.

      • GetCompression

        public static Compression GetCompression()
        Returns compression.

        Compression is a singleton object for the purpose of compressing and expanding FIDs and raw images.

        Returns:
        Importer.

      • GetQuality

        public static Quality GetQuality()
        Returns quality.

        Quality is a singleton object for the purpose of calculating image quality scores.

        Returns:
        Quality.
